name: Battery Storage Rebate
description: $0.15 per Wh up to $2,700 for battery storage with solar PV; FRAP customers get additional $2,000; LIHEAP-eligible customers get additional $2,000
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power provides rebates for battery storage systems paired with solar PV, with enhanced incentives for income-qualified customers.
whatTheyOffer:
- $0.15 per Wh up to $2,700 base rebate
- Additional $2,000 for FRAP customers
- Additional $2,000 for LIHEAP-eligible
- Up to $6,700 total for income-qualified
- Must pair with solar PV system
- Backup power during outages
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Valid for batteries purchased/installed after July 1, 2024
3. Must install with or have existing solar PV
4. Apply online through SVP rebate platform
5. Submit proof of purchase and installation
6. FRAP/LIHEAP customers submit additional documentation
keywords: Silicon Valley Power, SVP, battery storage, Santa Clara, $2700, $6700, Tesla Powerwall, solar, backup power, FRAP, LIHEAP
